short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist browser extension that replaces the default new tab page with a sleek search interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features

1. Multi-engine search capability

2. Double-click functionality to open search engine homepages

3. Show or disable search history

4. Quick access shortcuts to popular services

5. Customizable color themes to suit your preferences

6. Completely hide all elements except the search area
